quote: I'm not the kind of person who tries to be cool or trendy, I'm definitely an individual.
author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quote: Nothing is cooler and more attractive than a big comeback, and that'll be me.
author: Steven Adler

quote: I'm a mirror. If you're cool with me, I'm cool with you, and the exchange starts. What you see is what you reflect. If you don't like what you see, then you've done something. If I'm standoffish, that's because you are.
author: Jay-Z

quote: Being cool is being your own self, not doing something that someone else is telling you to do.
author: Vanessa Hudgens

quote: The secret was to just be cool, stay in God's graces, and work it out.
author: Solomon Burke

quote: To create well I have to be in a good mood, happy and cool.
author: Marc Newson

quote: Be still and cool in thine own mind and spirit.
author: George Fox

quote: I've never been cool - and I don't care.
author: Celine Dion

quote: Is a hippopotamus a hippopotamus, or just a really cool Opotamus?
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: Rather be dead than cool.
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: I think you create your own hipness.
author: Peabo Bryson

quote: Let your soul stand cool and composed before a million universes.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: I don't need to hang out in a posse and try to act cool.
author: Jeremy London

quote: I can take it. The tougher it gets, the cooler I get.
author: Richard M. Nixon

quote: It's so important to realize that every time you get upset, it drains your emotional energy. Losing your cool makes you tired. Getting angry a lot messes with your health.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Good words cool more than cold water.
author: John Ray

quote: I'm cool with failing so long as I know that there are people around me that love me unconditionally.
author: Dave Chappelle

quote: I suppose being fierce is a very good thing, and a very cool thing. But more than fierce, I think I'm a strong person and a strong individual. And that's what I take with me every day.
author: Johnny Weir

quote: You don't have to carry a designer bag that costs more than a car to look cool.
author: Kesha

quote: Keep a cool head and maintain a low profile. Never take the lead - but aim to do something big.
author: Deng Xiaoping

quote: Whatever hysteria exists is inflamed by mystery, suspicion and secrecy. Hard and exact facts will cool it.
author: Elia Kazan

quote: He who keeps his cool best wins.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: Nothing gives one person so much advantage over another as to remain always cool and unruffled under all circumstances.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: All of my favorite people - people I really trust - none of them were cool in their younger years.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: I've never been cool and I don't really care about being cool. It's just an awful lot of time and hair gel wasted.
author: Chris Martin

quote: Competition is great. And as long as it's friendly and not a malicious thing, then I think it's cool.
author: Janet Jackson

quote: I don't think of myself as hot or cool or anything, just a dork.
author: Ashley Olsen

quote: Sometimes just when I say hello the right way, I'm like, 'Whoa, I'm so cool.'
author: Robert Pattinson

quote: One cool judgment is worth a thousand hasty counsels. The thing to do is to supply light and not heat.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: I want to be a vampire. They're the coolest monsters.
author: Gerard Way

quote: I think it would be cool if you were writing a ransom note on your computer, if the paper clip popped up and said, 'Looks like you're writing a ransom note. Need help? You should use more forceful language, you'll get more money.'
author: Demetri Martin

quote: I never cut class. I loved getting A's, I liked being smart. I liked being on time. I thought being smart is cooler than anything in the world.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: When I was younger, the pressure was just being cool. I never thought of myself as a cool guy. I always thought of myself as more of the goofy guy.
author: Paul Walker

quote: I think all jocks have a sensitive side. It's just, will they show it to anybody? Will they let their guard down and stop being tough and the cool jock guy around their friends, or just relax? I don't know if it's best to say opening up, but just relax and really say what you're actually thinking, and not what you think people want to hear.
author: Channing Tatum

quote: All women do have a different sense of sexuality, or sense of fun, or sense of like what's sexy or cool or tough.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: People see my photos and think I labor over my image and I'm this cool, brooding artist. But I'm just having fun with it.
author: Lenny Kravitz

quote: I think you have to be cool to be a good flirt, and I don't think I'm very cool.
author: Harry Styles

quote: I'm a geeky toy collector, and to have toys of your own characters is unbelievably cool.
author: Craig McCracken

quote: Prominence is cool, but when the delusion kicks in it can be a drag. Especially if you choose to surround yourself with friends and not acolytes.
author: Barbara Kruger

quote: Morgan Freeman is so class. He's so cool. He's so scary.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: Being uncool is being pretty much the coolest you can be.
author: Rufus Wainwright

quote: I never saw music in terms of men and women or black and white. There was just cool and uncool.
author: Bonnie Raitt

quote: Some years I'm the coolest thing that ever happened, and then the next year everyone's so over me, and I'm just so past my sell date.
author: Cher

quote: Heroes don't wear diapers. It's just not cool.
author: Felix Baumgartner

quote: People look at me and see a calm, cool guy on the sidelines and I want them to know that my Christian faith affects my coaching and everything I do.
author: Tony Dungy

quote: I just tried to keep my cool and continue with my race plan: to win.
author: Mark Spitz

quote: And in a world without heroes, as the movie trailer voice-over guy might say, the slightly awkward can be slightly cool.
author: Adam Brody

quote: These days it's cool to be ethnic and to be different, but when I was a kid, it was not cool - at all. My friends would come over and my mom would make crepes with eggs, stuffed with mozzarella cheese, tomatoes and spinach. And they'd be like, 'What is this?'
author: Giada De Laurentiis

quote: Being cool, having a 'cool' energy is just not attractive to me.
author: Selena Gomez

quote: Sometimes life's so much cooler when you just don't know any better and all the painful lessons have not hammered your head open yet.
author: Anthony Kiedis

quote: I'm cute - and God I hate that. Because that's not cool. I'm like your niece, and nobody wants to date their niece. It's the chubby cheeks. The whole reason people voted for me on American Idol is because I'm an everyday, normal girl.
author: Kelly Clarkson

quote: There aren't many poster children for cool angst. Everybody thinks it's cool if you're the bad girl.
author: Fiona Apple

quote: To act coolly, intelligently and prudently in perilous circumstances is the test of a man - and also a nation.
author: Adlai Stevenson I

quote: It seems like once people grow up, they have no idea what's cool.
author: Bill Watterson

quote: The simple truth is that balding African-American men look cool when they shave their heads, whereas balding white men look like giant thumbs.
author: Dave Barry

quote: It looks good when you see someone kicking at the age of 51 with no double. It's kinda cool for people to know that past 50 we can keep flexible.
author: Jean-Claude Van Damme

quote: Some people are cool with the fact that their bodies bear witness to this great thing they produced, their children, and I understand that. But on a personal level, it makes me feel better that my breasts are not down to my knees when I'm undressed in front of my husband.
author: Patricia Heaton

quote: I'm a flamboyant type of guy, a cooler version of Liberace.
author: Usher

quote: Spiderman can climb walls and he's got a cool outfit.
author: Rhona Mitra

quote: I've never done anything because I thought it would look cool.
author: John Mayer
